APPRIS::Analysis CORSAIR
SummaryPackage variablesSynopsisDescriptionGeneral documentationMethods
Summary
APPRIS::Analysis::CORSAIR - Object representing an analysis run
Package variables
No package variables defined.
Included modules
APPRIS::Utils::Argument qw ( rearrange )
APPRIS::Utils::Exception qw ( throw warning deprecate )
Synopsis
  my $analysis = APPRIS::Analysis::CORSAIR->new(
    -score                 => ,
    -vertebrate_signal     => ,
  );
Description
A representation of analysis of CORSAIR within the APPRIS system.
Object to store details of an analysis run.

Methods code
DESTROYdescriptionprevnextTop
sub DESTROY {}
newdescriptionprevnextTop
sub new {
	my ($caller) = shift;

	my ($caller_is_obj) = ref($caller);
	return $caller if $caller_is_obj;
	my ($class) = $caller_is_obj || $caller;
	my ($self) = bless {}, $class;

	my (
		$result,
		$vertebrate_signal,		$score
	)
	= rearrange( [
		'result',
		'vertebrate_signal',	'score'
	],
	@_
	);
	
	$self->result($result);
 	$self->vertebrate_signal($vertebrate_signal);
 	$self->score($score);
		
	return $self;
}
resultdescriptionprevnextTop
sub result {
	my ($self) = shift;
	$self->{'result'} = shift if(@_);
	return $self->{'result'};
}
scoredescriptionprevnextTop
sub score {
	my ($self) = shift;
	$self->{'score'} = shift if(@_);
	return $self->{'score'};
}
vertebrate_signaldescriptionprevnextTop
sub vertebrate_signal {
	my ($self) = shift;
	$self->{'vertebrate_signal'} = shift if(@_);
	return $self->{'vertebrate_signal'};
}
